metadata.title: CVE-2020-15665 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Firefox did not reset the address bar after the beforeunload dialog wasshown if the user chose to remain on the page. This could have resulted inan incorrect URL being shown when used in conjunction with other unexpectedbrowser behaviors. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 80.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15665` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 80.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 80.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 80.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '80.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
